title: Dialog Text - Sound Effects
description: Now your dialogue will have some awesome sounds!
longDescription:
Hello Developer!


In this package you will have access to more than 200 sound effects for your text windows, they are very varied, and you also get another package with sound effects for pens, pencils, and related things as a bonus.


Check the preview

Check the documentation


Variety

Here you will find very varied sounds from Cartoon, Cute Monsters, Writing, Retro, Digital, and many others, the cool thing about these sounds is that they are super fast, so you can also use them for other things like UI, or small confirmations like find an item, or press a button, a very useful package!


Quality

All of these sounds were professionally recorded and edited, or made with synthesizers and digital instruments, ensuring the highest quality for your game! You can see the sounds working in the preview.


Organization and ease of use

All sounds are separated into folders with the name COLLECTION, this is due to the fact that a survey I did with developers said that they randomized the sounds in these dialog windows, so I separated similar sounds into folders, and you can randomize the sounds which are there in a window, ensuring ease of use.


Helping each other

By investing in this package you will be helping me to continue creating, and you will also get all the items described above, not to mention that I am available for email support for any potential problems.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 244

Number of Audio Cues: 244

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) The one that does contains 'Loop' on the name

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Important/Additional Notes:
